SELECT rno, mno, id, mail, jdate, tcnt, rcnt, spoint FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rno, mno, id, mail, jdate, tcnt, rcnt, NVL(sumpoint, 0) spoint FROM member m, ( SELECT count(t.mno) tcnt, m.mno no1 FROM transaction t, member m WHERE m.mno = t.mno(+) GROUP BY m.mno ), ( SELECT count(r.rno) rcnt, m.mno no2 FROM review r, transaction t, member m WHERE r.tno(+) = t.tno AND m.mno = t.mno(+) GROUP BY m.mno ), ( SELECT mb.mno no3, m1.sumpoint sumpoint FROM ( SELECT m.mno, p.sumpoint, p.pno FROM point p, member m WHERE m.mno = p.mno(+) AND p.pno IN (SELECT max(pno) mpno FROM point GROUP BY mno) ) m1, member mb WHERE m1.mno(+) = mb.mno ) WHERE no1 = m.mno AND no2 = m.mno AND no3 = m.mno AND isshow = 'cst' ORDER BY m.mno ASC ) WHERE rno between #{startCont} AND #{endCont}

SELECT tno, g.ino, TO_CHAR(tdate, 'YYYY-mm-dd') tdate, dir, savename, gname, price, quantity FROM goods g, transaction t, img i WHERE mno = #{mno} AND g.gno = t.gno AND g.ino = i.ino ORDER BY tno DESC
SELECT substr(mon, 4, 2) label FROM ( SELECT ADD_MONTHS (sysdate, LEVEL - 6) mon FROM DUAL CONNECT BY rownum < 7 )

SELECT q.qno, q.title, q.body, q.mno, q.qdate, a.qno ano, a.body abody, a.mno mngno, a.qdate adate, m.id, mng.id mid FROM qna q, qna a, member m, member mng WHERE q.qno = a.upqno(+) AND m.isshow not like 'mng' AND q.mno = m.mno AND a.mno = mng.mno(+) order by qdate asc
SELECT count(*) data FROM member WHERE not isshow = 'mng' GROUP BY gen

SELECT data, month FROM ( SELECT substr(ADD_MONTHS (sysdate, LEVEL - 6), 0, 5) month FROM DUAL CONNECT BY rownum < 7 ) m1 ,( select substr(jdate, 0, 5) j, count(*) data FROM member WHERE NOT isshow = 'mng' group by substr(jdate, 0, 5) ) m2 WHERE m1.month = m2.j(+) ORDER BY month
SELECT g.gno, caname, gname, dir, savename, price, hits, stock, issell FROM goods g, category c, img i WHERE g.cano = c.cano AND g.ino = i.ino AND purpose = 'gds'

SELECT gno, g.cano, gname, gdetail, g.ino, dir, i.savename, price, stock, issell, large, middle, small FROM goods g, img i, ( SELECT c.cano small, g.cano middle, z.cano large FROM category c, category g, category z WHERE g.cano = c.upno AND z.cano = g.upno ) cate WHERE gno = #{gno} AND cate.small = g.cano AND g.ino = i.ino

mapper.select: SELECT count(*) data, large, label FROM transaction t, goods g, ( SELECT c.cano small, z.cano large, z.caname label FROM category c, category g, category z WHERE g.cano = c.upno AND z.cano = g.upno ) WHERE t.gno = g.gno AND g.cano = small AND t.isshow = 'Y' group by large, label order by large

SELECT NVL(data, 0) data, label FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(sysdate + LEVEL-6, 'YY/mm/dd') label FROM DUAL CONNECT BY rownum < 7 ) t, ( SELECT SUM(quantity * price) data, TO_CHAR(tdate, 'YY/mm/dd') tdate FROM transaction t, goods g WHERE g.gno = t.gno AND t.isshow = 'Y' group by TO_CHAR(tdate, 'YY/mm/dd') ) tt WHERE t.label = tt.tdate(+) order by label

SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(quantity * price),0), 'FM999,999,999,999,999,999') total, sum, data FROM transaction t, goods g, ( SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(quantity * price), 0), 'FM999,999,999,999,999,999') sum, count(tno) data FROM transaction t, goods g WHERE t.gno = g.gno AND t.isshow = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(tdate, 'YY/mm/dd') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YY/mm/dd') ) WHERE t.gno = g.gno group by sum, data

SELECT SUM(quantity * price) data, large, label FROM transaction t, goods g, ( SELECT c.cano small, z.cano large, z.caname label FROM category c, category g, category z WHERE g.cano = c.upno AND z.cano = g.upno ) WHERE t.gno = g.gno AND small = g.cano AND t.isshow = 'Y' group by large, label order by large

SELECT data, month FROM ( SELECT substr(ADD_MONTHS (sysdate, LEVEL - 6), 0, 5) month FROM DUAL CONNECT BY rownum < 7 ) m1 ,( select substr(tdate, 0, 5) j, SUM(quantity * price) data FROM transaction t, goods g WHERE t.isshow = 'Y' AND t.gno = g.gno group by substr(tdate, 0, 5) ) m2 WHERE m1.month = m2.j(+) ORDER BY month
